newsitem.title: USA: Evenflo to buy Huffy Corp's Gerry division.
newsitem.headline: Evenflo to buy Huffy Corp's Gerry division.

text.p: Infant and juvenile products maker Evenflo Co Inc said it has reached a definitive agreement to acquire the operating assets of Gerry Baby Products Co from Huffy Corp.
Terms of the deal were not announced.
Evenflo is a unit of Evenflo & Spalding Holdings Corp.
Gerry manufacturers juvenile products markets them under the Gerry and Snugli brand names.
The transaction is expected to close in the second quarter of 1997, subject to regulatory approval, Evenflo said.
In a later release, Huffy later said that it sold the Gerry assets for $73 million to the Piqua, Ohio-based Evenflo.
